clues.text: Like father, like son--several of his 20 kids, including Carl Philipp Emanuel, also became composers

He came from a family of 9 kids & had 11 of his own; sadly, he died before his youngest, Rory, was born in 1968

Home to the lowest & highest places on the surface of the Earth
Home to more countries than any other continent
You can gaze at a 3,212-foot waterfall there
It has about the same population as the state of Texas

This, high blood pressure, contributes to the hardening of the arteries & damages the heart
The insipidus type of this endocrine disorder can affect the kidneys or the pituitary; the mellitus type is more common

rounds.category: THE MOVIE ROLE HE WAS BORN TO PLAY

rounds.category: YOU DO KNOW HIM FROM ADAM

clues.text: In Genesis 2 Adam gives names to the animals; in Genesis 6, this man rounds 'em up
1 Corinthians says, "for as in Adam all die, even so in" him "shall all be made alive"
In Genesis 3 God makes Adam a coat of skins; in Genesis 37 Jacob makes this son a coat of many colors
In Genesis 3:19 God tells Adam he'll return to dust; in Exodus 8:17, this brother's rod turns dust to lice
Seth is Adam's son; Solomon is this king's son

rounds.text: Ambrose Bierce, a Civil War veteran, said of this 1895 book, the author "knows nothing of war, yet he is drenched in blood"
